nodes.id: 中华人民共和国副主席

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国副主席
en: Vice President of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国家副元首，具有很高荣誉性质，负责礼仪性外交工作。该职务于1954年设立，1975年被废除，后于1982年恢复。
description.en: The Vice Head of State of the People's Republic of China, a position of high honor responsible for ceremonial diplomatic work. The post was established in 1954, abolished in 1975, and reinstated in 1982.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中华人民共和国副主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, the current Vice President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要领导人之一，首任中华人民共和国副主席。
description.en: One of the main leaders of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China, the first Vice President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，1983年国家副主席职务恢复后的首任副主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, the first person to hold the office of Vice President after its reinstatement in 1983.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国副主席，后被授予中华人民共和国名誉主席称号。
description.en: Chinese political figure who served as Vice President of the People's Republic of China and was later awarded the title of Honorary President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国副主席，并一度担任代理主席。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Vice President of the People's Republic of China and for a time as acting President.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国主席，在文化大革命期间失势。
description.en: Chinese politician, former President of the People's Republic of China who lost power during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国副主席。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Vice President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国企业家和政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国副主席。
description.en: Chinese entrepreneur and politician who served as Vice President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国副主席、中华人民共和国主席、中共中央总书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Vice President of the PRC, President of the PRC, and General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国副主席。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Vice President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国副主席，现任中华人民共和国主席、中共中央总书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Vice President of the PRC, current President of the PRC and General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国副主席。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Vice President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国副主席。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Vice President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和领导人，曾任中华人民共和国主席。
description.en: The main founder and leader of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China, served as President of the PRC.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国主席。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国主席。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国主席、中共中央总书记。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as President of the People's Republic of China and General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高国家权力机关，负责选举国家副主席。
description.en: The highest state authority of the People's Republic of China, responsible for electing the Vice President.

en: President of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国家元首职位。
description.en: The position of the head of state of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1966年至1976年在中国发生的一场政治运动，导致时任国家主席刘少奇失势。
description.en: A political movement in China from 1966 to 1976, which led to the downfall of then-President Liu Shaoqi.

description.zh-cn: 指1971年9月13日林彪等人乘机出走坠机身亡的事件。此事件后，董必武被宣布为唯一的代理主席。
description.en: Refers to the event on September 13, 1971, when Lin Biao and others died in a plane crash while fleeing. After this incident, Dong Biwu was announced as the sole acting president.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国宪法 (1954年)

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国宪法 (1954年)
en: 1954 Constitution of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第一部宪法，设立了国家主席和副主席的职位。
description.en: The first constitution of the People's Republic of China, which established the posts of President and Vice President.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国宪法 (1975年)

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国宪法 (1975年)
en: 1975 Constitution of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第二部宪法，取消了国家主席和副主席的职位。
description.en: The second constitution of the People's Republic of China, which abolished the posts of President and Vice President.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国宪法 (1982年)

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国宪法 (1982年)
en: 1982 Constitution of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第四部宪法，恢复了国家主席和副主席的职位。
description.en: The fourth constitution of the People's Republic of China, which reinstated the posts of President and Vice President.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国宪法修正案 (2018年)

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国宪法修正案 (2018年)
en: 2018 Amendment to the Constitution of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 对1982年宪法的修正案，废除了国家主席和副主席的连任限制。
description.en: An amendment to the 1982 Constitution that removed the term limits for the President and Vice President.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国代理主席

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国代理主席
en: Acting President of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 在中华人民共和国主席缺位时临时代理其职权的人员或机构。
description.en: The person or institution that temporarily exercises the powers of the President of the People's Republic of China in their absence.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的八个民主党派之一。
description.en: One of the eight democratic parties in the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 第十四届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第十四届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第十四届全国人民代表大会，于2023年3月选举韩正为国家副主席。
description.en: The 14th National People's Congress of the People's Republic of China, which elected Han Zheng as Vice President in March 2023.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国副主席
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国主席

description.zh-cn: 根据《中华人民共和国宪法》，副主席协助主席工作，受主席的委托，可以代行使主席的部分职权。
description.en: According to the Constitution of the People's Republic of China, the Vice President assists the President and may exercise part of the President's functions and powers upon the President's entrustment.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国副主席
relationships.target: 全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国副主席向全国人民代表大会负责，由其选举产生。
description.en: The Vice President of the People's Republic of China is responsible to and elected by the National People's Congress.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国宪法 (1954年)
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国副主席

description.zh-cn: 1954年宪法首次设立了中华人民共和国副主席的职位。
description.en: The 1954 Constitution first established the post of Vice President of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国宪法 (1975年)
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国副主席

description.zh-cn: 1975年宪法取消了中华人民共和国副主席的职位。
description.en: The 1975 Constitution abolished the post of Vice President of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国宪法 (1982年)
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国副主席

description.zh-cn: 1982年宪法恢复设置了中华人民共和国副主席的职位。
description.en: The 1982 Constitution reinstated the post of Vice President of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国宪法修正案 (2018年)
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国副主席

description.zh-cn: 2018年宪法修正案废除了中华人民共和国副主席的连任限制。
description.en: The 2018 constitutional amendment removed the term limits for the Vice President of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 刘少奇

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命爆发后，时任国家主席刘少奇失势下台。
description.en: After the outbreak of the Cultural Revolution, then-President Liu Shaoqi lost power and was removed from office.

relationships.target: 董必武

description.zh-cn: 九一三事件后，董必武被宣布为唯一的代理主席。
description.en: After the September 13 Incident, Dong Biwu was announced as the sole acting president.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国副主席
习近平

description.zh-cn: 韩正担任副主席期间，主席为习近平。
description.en: During Han Zheng's term as Vice President, Xi Jinping was the President.

relationships.source: 第十四届全国人民代表大会
relationships.target: 韩正

description.zh-cn: 第十四届全国人民代表大会第一次会议选举韩正为中华人民共和国副主席。
description.en: The first session of the 14th National People's Congress elected Han Zheng as the Vice President of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国副主席
毛泽东

description.zh-cn: 朱德担任副主席期间，主席为毛泽东。
description.en: During Zhu De's term as Vice President, Mao Zedong was the President.

中国民主建国会

description.zh-cn: 荣毅仁是中国民主建国会成员。
description.en: Rong Yiren was a member of the China National Democratic Construction Association.

relationships.target: 中国共产党

description.zh-cn: 荣毅仁的中共党员身份在其生前未公开。
description.en: Rong Yiren's membership in the Chinese Communist Party was not disclosed during his lifetime.
